title: Firstly, That's the Home page that includes all the links to the other pages.
Signup Page, where you can create an account, manually or using Google.
Login Page, where you must login to access the admin pages.
Profile Page, where you can see your profile, your scores and you can edit it.
Create Page, where you can create a new Deck or a new Card.
Deck Page, where you can make a new deck, add cards to it and edit it.
Card Page, where you can make a new card, add it to a deck and edit its properties.
Practice Page, where you can see your decks and practice them or remove them.
Starting Page, where you can see the starting page of the quiz and includes all the quiz details.
Meaning Quiz, where you asked to answer the translation of the card.
Choose Quiz, where you asked to choose the correct translation of the card.
Complete Quiz, where you asked to complete the missing letters of the translation.
TrueOrFalse Quiz, where you asked to answer if the translation or word Type is true or false.
Connecting Quiz, where you asked to connect the words with its translations.
Result Page, where you can see your score and the wrong answers answers.
